cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.7.0)

# add sources to the project
set (sources
     ${sources}
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lower1.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lower2.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lower3.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lower4.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lower5.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/upper1.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/upper2.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/upper3.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/upper4.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/upper5.hpp
     PARENT_SCOPE)
